name: DecidePause
signal_source: Decision-making research shows users benefit from '24-Hour Rule' and 'setting a timer and forcing yourself to wait before acting on impulse'
description: Decision delay app that implements cooling-off periods for important choices and purchases
target_user: Impulse shoppers and decision-makers who want structured delays to make more thoughtful choices
pain_point_evidence: Users find 'after 10 minutes, the urge subsides, or you gain a better perspective on the decision' with time-based interventions
differentiation: Structured delays vs. general mindfulness, decision-specific rather than broad impulse control
subscription_fit: Premium includes custom delay rules, decision analytics, and family sharing features

pricing.trial_strategy: Free basic delays, premium for custom rules and analytics
